name: Blundstone Leather 1496 Boots - Unisex
description: These Blundstones are lighter, airier and more breathable than the classic boots. Built for comfort, they flex and support your feet with every step you take. A fantastic summertime option.Water-resistant leather upper.Anti-microbial lining.Comfort footbeds absorb and disperse shock.Pull loops for extra leverage.Steel shank offers stability and keeps you grounded.Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion resistant.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
